structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - WATER AND SEWER EXTENSION POLICIES
Sec. 8-2032. - ASSESSMENT; CITY TO SHARE COST OF OVERSIZED LINES.

law.catch_line: ASSESSMENT; CITY TO SHARE COST OF OVERSIZED LINES.
law.text: In the event it is necessary or desirable in the opinion of the Director of Public Utilities to lay a water main larger than a six-inch main, or sewer main larger than an eight-inch main, the City will bear the cost of the difference between the size of main required and a six-inch water main or eight-inch sewer main. (Code 1959 , ยง23-9(1); Ord. No. 1985-543, ยง15, 4-16-85) Editor's note: Regulations concerning reimbursements for oversized utility lines are found in Standard Operating Procedure No. 700-6.
